description: This table contains fields that have been discontinued from dialysis regulatory reporting forms.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: CURRENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current state of the registry record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Associated


Populated


In Progress


Edited


Validated


Needs Review


Ready for Export


Exported


Restored


Signed


Ready to Sign


Ready to Submit


Submitted


Accepted


Rejected


Done


Submit


Historical


Modified


Inactivated


Void


Saved to EQRS


Dialysis Intra-Facility Transfer


Investigating


Closed


Abstracting


Completed


Ready for Nurse Review


Ready for Physician Review


Waiting for Signoff


Care Planning Complete


Will Not Be Exported


Accepted with Warnings


A0410 Correction Requested


Wrong FAC_ID


Test Record


Corrected/Inactivated/Deleted


Abandoned


Admission Complete


Doc Complete


Filed

columns.name: FLU_NOT_RECV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a dialysis patient's influenza vaccination not received reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Medical


Patient

columns.name: FLU_NOT_RECV_MED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the medical reason why a dialysis patient did not receive an influenza vaccination.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Allergic


Adverse


OtherMedical

columns.name: FLU_NOT_RECV_PAT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the non-medical reason why a dialysis patient did not receive an influenza vaccination. This is known as the patient reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cultural


Personal

columns.name: PCV_NOT_RECV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores a dialysis patient's pneumococcal vaccination not received reason.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FLU_NOT_RECV_RSN_C_NAME

columns.name: PCV_NOT_RECV_MED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the medical reason why a dialysis patient did not receive a pneumococcal vaccination.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FLU_NOT_RECV_MED_RSN_C_NAME

columns.name: PCV_NOT_RECV_PAT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the non-medical reason why a dialysis patient did not receive a pneumococcal vaccination. This is known as the patient reason.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FLU_NOT_RECV_PAT_RSN_C_NAME

columns.name: HOSP_IDENT
columns.description: It stores the dialysis patient's hospitalization ID.

columns.name: HOSP_ADMIT_DATE
columns.description: It stores the dialysis patient's hospitalization admission date.

columns.name: HOSP_NAME
columns.description: It stores the name of the hospital where the dialysis patient is admitted.

columns.name: HOSP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
It stores the dialysis patient's hospitalization type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hospitalization


ERResultingHospitalization


ER

columns.name: HOSP_DISCH_DATE
columns.description: It stores the dialysis patient's hospitalization discharge date.

columns.name: INFECTION_IDENT
columns.description: It stores the dialysis patient's infection ID.

columns.name: INFECTION_REQ_HOSP_YN
columns.description:
It stores whether or not hospitalization is required for a dialysis patient's infection.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: INFECTION_HOSP_DATE
columns.description: It stores the date of admission that occurred because of dialysis infection.
